Key Match Events: Gerrit Cole pitched a gem, holding the Kansas City Royals to a single run over seven innings
Juan Soto, Gleyber Torres, and Giancarlo Stanton drove in runs for the Yankees
Clay Holmes tossed a perfect eighth inning and Luke Weaver breezed through the ninth, extending the scoreless streak by Yankees relievers to 15 and two-thirds innings this postseason
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge expressed pride in the teamâ€™s resilience after the comeback win
Aaron Judge remembered the team's struggles in the previous season and their determination not to miss the postseason again
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kansas City Royals did not win a home game after 8 September, losing nine in a row including the playoffs
The New York Yankees won 50 games away from home in the regular season, their most in 21 years
Others: The New York Yankees will play Cleveland or Detroit of the ALCS starting Monday night at Yankee Stadium
